310_executable.label: 3.10 Executable location
310_executable.tooltip: Where the 3.10 executable is located. %USERPROFILE% will be replaced with C:\Users\youruser\

_btn_flush_log.label: Flush Log
_btn_flush_log.tooltip: Flushes the logging buffer to file. Will not provide a feedback response.

_btn_graceful_shutdown.label: Shut down dock (Graceful)
_btn_graceful_shutdown.tooltip: Shuts down the dock daemon, gracefully shutting down all scripts running inside of it

_btn_ungraceful_shutdown.label: Shut down dock (Ungraceful)
_btn_ungraceful_shutdown.tooltip: Shuts down the dock daemon, terminating all scripts running inside of it immediately
